title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in column two of the property sheet does not size correctly when any of the strings in the dropdown menu is wider than the width of the column. As a result, the dropdown button may be too far right and clipped off the visible area of the property sheet.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the PropertySheetViewer.
2. Edit an object using the ComboBoxCellEditor in column two.
3. Ensure that at least one of the strings in the dropdown menu is wider than the width of the column.
4. Observe that the dropdown button is positioned too far right and clipped off the visible area of the property sheet.
